articles.title: Unlocking Alzheimer's Secrets: Machine Learning Techniques for Early Detection
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Archyde interviews Dr. Eleanor Vance about a new AI-powered system for early detection of mild cognitive impairment (MCI). Dr. Vance is a leading expert in geriatric neurology and the Director of Cognitive Health at the Redwood Research Institute. The system uses a combination of motor function and cognitive skill assessments to identify subtle signs of MCI earlier than traditional methods. It has an accuracy rate of 83%.

articles.title: Mississippi Senate Bill Targets AI Use and Regulation in the State
